price: 78਼ ਅਤੇ ਕਿਅਮਾਤ ਤਕ ਲਈ ਤੇਰੇ ਉੱਤੇ ਮੇਰੀ ਫ਼ਿਟਕਾਰ ਹੈ।
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ لَعۡنَتِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnatī ilā yawmi al-dīni
